author: Henna Silvennoinen, Mira Tengvall, Edith Villegas Garcia

short_description.content: The signs are in the air. And they couldn’t be more obvious. People wandering in tunnels, long queues in the canteen after the morning lectures, the local supermarket’s parking lot crowded with white bikes that have blue stickers on them…

title: Improving educational content with high-school teachers: A field report from CMS summer students
